1: וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>spake</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>unto Moses</n> בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <sup>6160 </sup> <n>in the plains</n> מוֹאָ֑ב <sup>4124 </sup> <n>of Moab</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>by</n> יַרְדֵּ֥ן <sup>3383 </sup> <n>by Jordan</n> יְרֵח֖וֹ <sup>3405 </sup> <n>[near] Jericho</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n>
2: צַו֮ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>Command</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וְנָתְנ֣וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>that they give</n> לַלְוִיִּ֗ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>unto the Levites</n> מִֽנַּחֲלַ֛ת <sup>5159 </sup> <n>of the inheritance</n> אֲחֻזָּתָ֖ם <sup>272 </sup> <n>of their possession</n> עָרִ֣ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> לָשָׁ֑בֶת <sup>3427 </sup> <n>to dwell in</n> וּמִגְרָ֗שׁ <sup>4054 </sup> <n>suburbs</n> לֶֽעָרִים֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>for the cities</n> סְבִיבֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> תִּתְּנ֖וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and ye shall give</n> לַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <sup>3881 </sup> <n>[also] unto the Levites</n>
3: וְהָי֧וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> הֶֽעָרִ֛ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>And the cities</n> לָהֶ֖ם לָשָׁ֑בֶת <sup>3427 </sup> <n>shall they have to dwell in</n> וּמִגְרְשֵׁיהֶ֗ם <sup>4054 </sup> <n>and the suburbs</n> יִהְי֤וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall be for</n> לִבְהֶמְתָּם֙ <sup>929 </sup> <n>of them shall be for their cattle</n> וְלִרְכֻשָׁ֔ם <sup>7399 </sup> <n>and for their goods</n> וּלְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and for all</n> חַיָּתָֽם׃ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>and for all their beasts</n>
4: וּמִגְרְשֵׁי֙ <sup>4054 </sup> <n>And the suburbs</n> הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the cities</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תִּתְּנ֖וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which ye shall give</n> לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>unto the Levites</n> מִקִּ֤יר <sup>7023 </sup> <n>[shall reach] from the wall</n> הָעִיר֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> וָח֔וּצָה <sup>2351 </sup> <n>and outward</n> אֶ֥לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>a thousand</n> אַמָּ֖ה <sup>520 </sup> <n>cubits</n> סָבִֽיב׃ <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n>
5: וּמַדֹּתֶ֞ם <sup>4058 </sup> <n>And ye shall measure</n> מִח֣וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>from without</n> לָעִ֗יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the city</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פְּאַת־ <sup>6285 </sup> <n>side</n> קֵ֣דְמָה <sup>6924 </sup> <n>on the east</n> אַלְפַּ֪יִם <sup>505 </sup> <n>two thousand</n> בָּֽאַמָּ֟ה <sup>520 </sup> <n>cubits</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פְּאַת־ <sup>6285 </sup> <n>side</n> נֶגֶב֩ <sup>5045 </sup> <n>and on the south</n> אַלְפַּ֨יִם <sup>505 </sup> <n>two thousand</n> בָּאַמָּ֜ה <sup>520 </sup> <n>cubits</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פְּאַת־ <sup>6285 </sup> <n>side</n> יָ֣ם ׀ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>and on the west</n> אַלְפַּ֣יִם <sup>505 </sup> <n>two thousand</n> בָּֽאַמָּ֗ה <sup>520 </sup> <n>cubits</n> וְאֵ֨ת <sup>853 </sup> פְּאַ֥ת <sup>6285 </sup> <n>side</n> צָפ֛וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>and on the north</n> אַלְפַּ֥יִם <sup>505 </sup> <n>two thousand</n> בָּאַמָּ֖ה <sup>520 </sup> <n>cubits</n> וְהָעִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>and the city</n> בַּתָּ֑וֶךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>[shall be] in the midst</n> זֶ֚ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> יִהְיֶ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall become</n> לָהֶ֔ם מִגְרְשֵׁ֖י <sup>4054 </sup> <n>this shall be to them the suburbs</n> הֶעָרִֽים׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the cities</n>
6: וְאֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> הֶֽעָרִ֗ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>And among the cities</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תִּתְּנוּ֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which ye shall give</n> לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>unto the Levites</n> אֵ֚ת <sup>853 </sup> שֵׁשׁ־ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>[there shall be] six</n> עָרֵ֣י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> הַמִּקְלָ֔ט <sup>4733 </sup> <n>for refuge</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תִּתְּנ֔וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which ye shall appoint</n> לָנֻ֥ס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>that he may flee</n> שָׁ֖מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>for</n> הָרֹצֵ֑חַ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>for the manslayer</n> וַעֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>addition</n> תִּתְּנ֔וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>thither and to them ye shall add</n> אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <sup>705 </sup> <n>forty</n> וּשְׁתַּ֖יִם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>and two</n> עִֽיר׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n>
7: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> הֶעָרִ֗ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>[So] all the cities</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תִּתְּנוּ֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which ye shall give</n> לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>to the Levites</n> אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <sup>705 </sup> <n>[shall be] forty</n> וּשְׁמֹנֶ֖ה <sup>8083 </sup> <n>and eight</n> עִ֑יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> אֶתְהֶ֖ן <sup>853 </sup> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶֽן׃ <sup>4054 </sup> <n>them [shall ye give] with their suburbs</n>
8: וְהֶֽעָרִ֗ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>And the cities</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תִּתְּנוּ֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which ye shall give</n> מֵאֲחֻזַּ֣ת <sup>272 </sup> <n>[shall be] of the possession</n> בְּנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> מֵאֵ֤ת <sup>853 </sup> הָרַב֙ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>from [them that have] many</n> תַּרְבּ֔וּ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>ye shall give many</n> וּמֵאֵ֥ת <sup>853 </sup> הַמְעַ֖ט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>but from [them that have] few</n> תַּמְעִ֑יטוּ <sup>4591 </sup> <n>ye shall give few</n> אִ֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> כְּפִ֤י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>according</n> נַחֲלָתוֹ֙ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>to his inheritance</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יִנְחָ֔לוּ <sup>5157 </sup> <n>which he inheriteth</n> יִתֵּ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>shall give</n> מֵעָרָ֖יו <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of his cities</n> לַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <sup>3881 </sup> <n>unto the Levites</n> פ
9: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>spake</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֹשֶׁ֥ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>unto Moses</n> לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n>
10: דַּבֵּר֙ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>Speak</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> אַתֶּ֛ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> עֹבְרִ֥ים <sup>5674 </sup> <n>unto them When ye be come over</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <sup>3383 </sup> <n>Jordan</n> אַ֥רְצָה <sup>776 </sup> <n>into the land</n> כְּנָֽעַן׃ <sup>3667 </sup> <n>of Canaan</n>
11: וְהִקְרִיתֶ֤ם <sup>7136 </sup> <n>Then ye shall appoint</n> לָכֶם֙ עָרִ֔ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>you cities</n> עָרֵ֥י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>to be cities</n> מִקְלָ֖ט <sup>4733 </sup> <n>of refuge</n> תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָכֶ֑ם וְנָ֥ס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>may flee</n> שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> רֹצֵ֔חַ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>for you that the slayer</n> מַכֵּה־ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>thither which killeth</n> נֶ֖פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>any person</n> בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <sup>7684 </sup> <n>at unawares</n>
12: וְהָי֨וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָכֶ֧ם הֶעָרִ֛ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>And they shall be unto you cities</n> לְמִקְלָ֖ט <sup>4733 </sup> <n>for refuge</n> מִגֹּאֵ֑ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>from the avenger</n> וְלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> יָמוּת֙ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>die</n> הָרֹצֵ֔חַ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>that the manslayer</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> עָמְד֛וֹ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>not until he stand</n> לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> הָעֵדָ֖ה <sup>5712 </sup> <n>the congregation</n> לַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>in judgment</n>
13: וְהֶעָרִ֖ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>And of these cities</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תִּתֵּ֑נוּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which ye shall give</n> שֵׁשׁ־ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>six</n> עָרֵ֥י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> מִקְלָ֖ט <sup>4733 </sup> <n>shall ye have for refuge</n> תִּהְיֶ֥ינָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָכֶֽם׃
14: אֵ֣ת ׀ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>three</n> הֶעָרִ֗ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> תִּתְּנוּ֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Ye shall give</n> מֵעֵ֣בֶר <sup>5676 </sup> <n>on this side</n> לַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <sup>3383 </sup> <n>Jordan</n> וְאֵת֙ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>and three</n> הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> תִּתְּנ֖וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>shall ye give</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> כְּנָ֑עַן <sup>3667 </sup> <n>of Canaan</n> עָרֵ֥י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>[which] shall be cities</n> מִקְלָ֖ט <sup>4733 </sup> <n>of refuge</n> תִּהְיֶֽינָה׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n>
15: לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[both] for the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וְלַגֵּ֤ר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>and for the stranger</n> וְלַתּוֹשָׁב֙ <sup>8453 </sup> <n>and for the sojourner</n> בְּתוֹכָ֔ם <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n> תִּהְיֶ֛ינָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> שֵׁשׁ־ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>These six</n> הֶעָרִ֥ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> הָאֵ֖לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>These</n> לְמִקְלָ֑ט <sup>4733 </sup> <n>shall be a refuge</n> לָנ֣וּס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>may flee</n> שָׁ֔מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>anyone</n> מַכֵּה־ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>them that every one that killeth</n> נֶ֖פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>any person</n> בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <sup>7684 </sup> <n>unawares</n>
16: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> בִּכְלִ֨י <sup>3627 </sup> <n>him with an instrument</n> בַרְזֶ֧ל ׀ <sup>1270 </sup> <n>of iron</n> הִכָּ֛הוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>And if he smite</n> וַיָּמֹ֖ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>so that he die</n> רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>he [is] a murderer</n> ה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> מ֥וֹת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall surely</n> יוּמַ֖ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>be put to death</n> הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>the murderer</n>
17: וְאִ֡ם <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> בְּאֶ֣בֶן <sup>68 </sup> <n>a stone</n> יָד֩ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>him with throwing</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יָמ֨וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>wherewith he may die</n> בָּ֥הּ הִכָּ֛הוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>And if he smite</n> וַיָּמֹ֖ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and he die</n> רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>he [is] a murderer</n> ה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> מ֥וֹת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall surely</n> יוּמַ֖ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>be put to death</n> הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>the murderer</n>
18: א֡וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>Or</n> בִּכְלִ֣י <sup>3627 </sup> <n>weapon</n> עֵֽץ־ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>of wood</n> יָד֩ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>him with an hand</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יָמ֨וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>wherewith he may die</n> בּ֥וֹ הִכָּ֛הוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>Or [if] he smite</n> וַיָּמֹ֖ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and he die</n> רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>he [is] a murderer</n> ה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> מ֥וֹת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall surely</n> יוּמַ֖ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>be put to death</n> הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>the murderer</n>
19: גֹּאֵ֣ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>The revenger</n> הַדָּ֔ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>of blood</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>him he</n> יָמִ֖ית <sup>4191 </sup> <n>himself shall slay</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָרֹצֵ֑חַ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>the murderer</n> בְּפִגְעוֹ־ <sup>6293 </sup> <n>when he meeteth</n> ב֖וֹ ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>himself</n> יְמִיתֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall slay</n>
20: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> בְּשִׂנְאָ֖ה <sup>8135 </sup> <n>him of hatred</n> יֶהְדָּפֶ֑נּוּ <sup>1920 </sup> <n>But if he thrust</n> אֽוֹ־ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> הִשְׁלִ֥יךְ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>or hurl</n> עָלָ֛יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> בִּצְדִיָּ֖ה <sup>6660 </sup> <n>at him by laying of wait</n> וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>that he die</n>
21: א֣וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> בְאֵיבָ֞ה <sup>342 </sup> <n>Or in enmity</n> הִכָּ֤הוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>smite</n> בְיָדוֹ֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>him with his hand</n> וַיָּמֹ֔ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>that he die</n> מֽוֹת־ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>[him] shall surely</n> יוּמַ֥ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>be put to death</n> הַמַּכֶּ֖ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>he that smote</n> רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>[for] he [is] a murderer</n> ה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> גֹּאֵ֣ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>the revenger</n> הַדָּ֗ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>of blood</n> יָמִ֛ית <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall slay</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָרֹצֵ֖חַ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>the murderer</n> בְּפִגְעוֹ־ <sup>6293 </sup> <n>when he meeteth</n> בֽוֹ׃
22: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> בְּפֶ֥תַע <sup>6621 </sup> <n>him suddenly</n> בְּלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>without</n> אֵיבָ֖ה <sup>342 </sup> <n>enmity</n> הֲדָפ֑וֹ <sup>1920 </sup> <n>But if he thrust</n> אוֹ־ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> הִשְׁלִ֥יךְ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>or have cast</n> עָלָ֛יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> כְּלִ֖י <sup>3627 </sup> <n>upon him any thing</n> בְּלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>without</n> צְדִיָּֽה׃ <sup>6660 </sup> <n>without laying of wait</n>
23: א֣וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> בְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> אֶ֜בֶן <sup>68 </sup> <n>Or with any stone</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>him</n> יָמ֥וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>wherewith a man may die</n> בָּהּ֙ בְּלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>[him] not</n> רְא֔וֹת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>seeing</n> וַיַּפֵּ֥ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and cast</n> עָלָ֖יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> וַיָּמֹ֑ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>[it] upon him that he die</n> וְהוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> אוֹיֵ֣ב <sup>341 </sup> <n>and [was] not his enemy</n> ל֔וֹ וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>neither sought</n> רָעָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>his harm</n>

25: וְהִצִּ֨ילוּ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>shall deliver</n> הָעֵדָ֜ה <sup>5712 </sup> <n>And the congregation</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָרֹצֵ֗חַ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>the slayer</n> מִיַּד֮ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>out of the hand</n> גֹּאֵ֣ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>of the revenger</n> הַדָּם֒ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>of blood</n> וְהֵשִׁ֤יבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall restore</n> אֹתוֹ֙ <sup>853 </sup> הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <sup>5712 </sup> <n>and the congregation</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> עִ֥יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>him to the city</n> מִקְלָט֖וֹ <sup>4733 </sup> <n>of his refuge</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>to which</n> נָ֣ס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>whither he was fled</n> שָׁ֑מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and he</n> וְיָ֣שַׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and he shall abide</n> בָּ֗הּ עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> מוֹת֙ <sup>4194 </sup> <n>in it unto the death</n> הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>priest</n> הַגָּדֹ֔ל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>of the high</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> מָשַׁ֥ח <sup>4886 </sup> <n>which was anointed</n> אֹת֖וֹ <sup>853 </sup> בְּשֶׁ֥מֶן <sup>8081 </sup> <n>oil</n> הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>with the holy</n>
26: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> יָצֹ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>shall at any time</n> יֵצֵ֖א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>come</n> הָרֹצֵ֑חַ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>But if the slayer</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גְּבוּל֙ <sup>1366 </sup> <n>without the border</n> עִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> מִקְלָט֔וֹ <sup>4733 </sup> <n>of his refuge</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>to which</n> יָנ֖וּס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>whither he was fled</n> שָֽׁמָּה׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n>
27: וּמָצָ֤א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>find</n> אֹתוֹ֙ <sup>853 </sup> גֹּאֵ֣ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>And the revenger</n> הַדָּ֔ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>of blood</n> מִח֕וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>him without</n> לִגְב֖וּל <sup>1366 </sup> <n>the borders</n> עִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> מִקְלָט֑וֹ <sup>4733 </sup> <n>of his refuge</n> וְרָצַ֞ח <sup>7523 </sup> <n>kill</n> גֹּאֵ֤ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>and the revenger</n> הַדָּם֙ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>of blood</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָ֣רֹצֵ֔חַ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>the slayer</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n> ל֖וֹ דָּֽם׃ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>he shall not be guilty of blood</n>
28: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> בְעִ֤יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in the city</n> מִקְלָטוֹ֙ <sup>4733 </sup> <n>of his refuge</n> יֵשֵׁ֔ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>Because he should have remained</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> מ֖וֹת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>until the death</n> הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>priest</n> הַגָּדֹ֑ל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>of the high</n> וְאַחֲרֵ֥י <sup>310 </sup> <n>but after</n> מוֹת֙ <sup>4194 </sup> <n>the death</n> הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>priest</n> הַגָּדֹ֔ל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>of the high</n> יָשׁוּב֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall return</n> הָרֹצֵ֔חַ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>the slayer</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>into the land</n> אֲחֻזָּתֽוֹ׃ <sup>272 </sup> <n>of his possession</n>
29: וְהָי֨וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אֵ֧לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>These</n> לָכֶ֛ם לְחֻקַּ֥ת <sup>2708 </sup> <n>So these [things] shall be for a statute</n> מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>of judgment</n> לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>1755 </sup> <n>unto you throughout your generations</n> בְּכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מוֹשְׁבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>4186 </sup> <n>in all your dwellings</n>

31: וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִקְח֥וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>Moreover ye shall take</n> כֹ֙פֶר֙ <sup>3724 </sup> <n>no satisfaction</n> לְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>for the life</n> רֹצֵ֔חַ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>of a murderer</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> רָשָׁ֖ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>which [is] guilty</n> לָמ֑וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>of death</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מ֖וֹת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>but he shall be surely</n> יוּמָֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>put to death</n>
32: וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִקְח֣וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>And ye shall take</n> כֹ֔פֶר <sup>3724 </sup> <n>no satisfaction</n> לָנ֖וּס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>for him that is fled</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to his</n> עִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>to the city</n> מִקְלָט֑וֹ <sup>4733 </sup> <n>of his refuge</n> לָשׁוּב֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>that he should come again</n> לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <sup>3427 </sup> <n>to dwell</n> בָּאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>before</n> מ֖וֹת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>until the death</n> הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <sup>3548 </sup> <n>of the priest</n>
